module_dashboard_desc: Centralized view of your key metrics and performance indicators.
module_marketplace_desc: Discover and activate new modules to extend your platform's features.
module_revenues_desc: Track all your income sources, monitor payments, and analyze trends.
module_billing_desc: Create, send, and manage professional invoices for your clients with ease.
module_quotes_desc: Generate and manage detailed quotes to send to your potential clients.
module_expenses_desc: Record and categorize all your business expenses for better financial tracking.
module_budget_desc: Set budgets, track spending by category, and stay in control of your finances.
module_trading_journal_desc: Log your trades, analyze your performance, and improve your trading strategies.
module_financial_report_desc: Generate comprehensive financial reports for an in-depth view of your business's health.
module_recurring_payments_desc: Automatically manage your subscriptions and recurring revenue streams.
module_crm_desc: Manage your customer relationships, track interactions, and centralize contact information.
module_product_management_desc: Organize your products and services, manage pricing and details for your business operations.
module_inventory_desc: Track your product stock, manage inventory levels, and value your assets.
module_stock_management_desc: Advanced stock management with alerts, supplier orders, and multi-warehouse tracking.
module_order_management_desc: Centralize and manage all your customer orders, from creation to delivery.
module_rental_management_desc: Manage your rental properties, bookings, and availability in one place.
module_calendar_desc: Organize your schedule, manage your appointments, and track important deadlines.
module_task_manager_desc: Create, assign, and track tasks to keep your projects on the right track.
module_projects_desc: Manage your projects from A to Z, from planning to delivery, with Kanban boards.
module_time_tracking_desc: Track time spent on projects and tasks for accurate billing and productivity analysis.
module_notes_desc: Take quick notes, jot down ideas, and organize your thoughts with an integrated editor.
module_ai_writing_assistant_desc: Generate high-quality text for your emails, marketing content, and more with AI.
module_ai_strategy_map_desc: Develop and visualize your business strategies with the help of artificial intelligence.
module_hr_desc: Manage your employees, payroll, and all human resources aspects of your company.
module_integrated_mail_desc: Connect your mailbox to manage your emails directly from the platform. (Coming soon)
module_automated_reminders_desc: Set up automated reminders for unpaid invoices, appointments, etc.
module_analytics_desc: Get detailed analytics and insights into your business performance.
module_seo_analyzer_desc: Analyze your website's SEO and get recommendations to improve your ranking.

app_description: Manage your entire business from a single platform. Billing, CRM, quotes, and much more, all in one place. Perfect for freelancers and SMEs.
plan_details_description: Here is the complete list of features included in the {{planName}} plan.
faq_subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about YourBizFlow.
faq1_a: Yes, our Free plan is completely free and allows you to use essential features like invoicing and CRM. It's perfect for getting started. We also offer paid plans for more advanced needs.
faq2_q: Can I change my plan at any time?
faq2_a: Of course! You can change your plan at any time from your account settings. The change will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.
faq3_a: Data security is our top priority. We use advanced encryption protocols and host your data on secure servers. You remain the sole owner of your data.
faq4_q: Can I use YourBizFlow on my mobile?
faq4_a: Absolutely. YourBizFlow is designed to be fully responsive and works perfectly on your smartphone or tablet, allowing you to manage your business wherever you are.
faq5_q: What payment methods do you accept?
faq5_a: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) through our secure payment partner, Stripe.
faq6_q: Do you offer a trial period for paid plans?
faq6_a: Our Free plan serves as an unlimited trial period! It allows you to test our basic features without any time limit.
faq7_q: What happens if I decide to stop using YourBizFlow?
faq7_a: You can export all your data (invoices, clients, etc.) at any time. If you wish to delete your account, you can do so from your settings, and all your data will be permanently deleted from our servers.
testimonial1_text: Since I started using YourBizFlow, my administrative management has been simplified. I create my invoices in 2 minutes flat between two sessions. A real time-saver!
testimonial1_avatar_alt: Portrait of Marc D., sports coach
testimonial2_text: I was drowning in spreadsheets. YourBizFlow centralized everything: clients, stock, and even profitability calculation. It's the co-pilot I was missing.
testimonial2_avatar_alt: Portrait of Léa R., e-commerce seller
testimonial3_text: From quoting to time tracking to invoicing, everything is in one place. I can focus on my code without getting lost in administrative tasks.
testimonial3_avatar_alt: Portrait of Karim B., freelance developer
testimonial4_text: The project management module is fantastic. I have a clear view of all my missions, and the financial reports help me anticipate my cash flow. Indispensable!
cta_subtitle: Join the thousands of entrepreneurs who have simplified their daily lives. Get started for free, no strings attached.
contact_subtitle: Have a question or need a personalized demo? Our team is here to help.
contact_success_message: Thank you! Your message has been sent. We will get back to you shortly.
landing_features_subtitle: Activate the modules you need and build the management tool that suits you. From finance to project management, it's all there.
landing_download_subtitle: Our mobile app allows you to track your activity, create invoices, and stay in touch with your clients, wherever you are.
pricing_title: A plan to match your growth
page_about_title: Our mission: to simplify your success.
page_about_p1: At YourBizFlow, we believe that business management should be simple, efficient, and accessible to everyone.
page_about_p2: Our platform brings together in a single space the essential tools to run your business: invoicing, client management, project tracking, analytics, CRM, and much more.
page_about_p3: Designed for both freelancers and businesses, YourBizFlow automates time-consuming tasks and allows you to focus on what's essential: growing your business.
page_about_p4: With an intuitive interface, modern integrations, and intelligent features, YourBizFlow is the digital partner that supports your daily growth.

seo.title: AI SEO Analyzer
seo.subtitle: Boost your search engine visibility with personalized recommendations.
seo.loading_text: The bot is analyzing your site... This may take up to a minute.
seo.result_word_count: {{count}} words (more than 300 is a good start).
seo.methodology_desc: The global score is a weighted average of several SEO pillars, combining your content analysis with results from the Google PageSpeed API.
seo.methodology_item1: Content (30%): Quality and structure (title, description, H1 tags, words).
seo.methodology_item3: PageSpeed Accessibility (15%): Ease of use for everyone.
seo.methodology_item4: PageSpeed SEO (15%): Adherence to basic SEO standards.
seo.methodology_item5: PageSpeed Best Practices (15%): General code and configuration quality.
seo.empty_state_desc: Enter your site's URL to get a complete report and AI-powered improvement suggestions.
seo.error_missing_url_desc: Please enter a URL to analyze.
seo.error_invalid_url_desc: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., https://example.com).
